# Pull Request

## Summary

What does this PR do? One or two sentences.

---

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New data type mapping
- [ ] New database connector (check: was this discussed in an issue first?)
- [ ] Documentation improvement
- [ ] Refactor (no behaviour change)
- [ ] Test coverage

---

## Related Issue

Closes # (issue number)

If there is no related issue, explain why this change is needed.

---

## How Was This Tested?

Describe how you tested the change. Include:
- What database versions were used
- What schema or data was used in testing
- Any edge cases you specifically tested

---

## Checklist

- [ ] I have read [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] My code follows the existing style (ruff for Python, rustfmt for Rust, ESLint for TypeScript)
- [ ] I have added or updated tests for this change
- [ ] I have updated documentation if required
- [ ] No credentials, connection strings, or real schema data are included
- [ ] The change does not break existing tests
